import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./product.css"; import Chart from "../../components/chart/Chart" import {productData} from "../../dummyData" import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; import MoivesReducer from "../../context/Moviecontext/MoviesReducer"; export default function Product() { const location = useLocation() const movie = location.movie return (

Movie

{ movie.title}
id: { movie._id}
Genre { movie.genre}
Year { movie.year}
limit {movie.limit }
); }
